text:
Yaar bhai hai tu mera.. Chotta bhai.. under 18 wala. ğŸ˜‚  Jab zindagii mai tum jese ache dost ho bulla katne k leye. Too bandi ki kya jarurat. 

Generally log apne room se bhaga dete hain.. jab bhe wo apni bandi se baat kr rahe hote hai.. lekine tu alag he level pe .. Tu mujhe bolta tha le meri bandi se baat kr. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ¤¦

DORA k chakar .. humanoid crowdfunding .. China mai tera passport gum .. aur yaad Hai.. Us din paison k leye DOSA k saamne hum dono kesi rone ki acting kr rahe the. ğŸ˜‚ Lekin saale ne paise fir bhe nahi deye. 

Lekin .. na beta na .. hum bhe kam nahi the BC .. wo paise nahi dega too. Hum Kahin aur se jugadwa lenge. 

Tere aur Himanshu k saath na jaane Kitne saahi  samaye betaye hain meine. Tu, Himanshu aur mai.. late night OAT mai truth and dare. Vese hum teeno ko ek dusre k bare mai sab pata hota tha .. fir bhe hum teeno OAT mai jake truth and dare he khelte the. ğŸ˜‚ 

**You and Me all the time.**ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Me - Bhai yaar kitna paisa kharch krta hai tu. 
You - Bsdk meri mummy jesi baaten matt kr 

Night out mar mar k .. humanoid room mai kam keya hai hum dono ne .. aur jab thak jaate the too niche hall12 canteen mai jake maggi kha lete thi. ğŸ¤§

Bhai wo kese bhul sakta mai .. Y17 ki Takneek .. usme hamara bot overall first aaya tha .. Mai weight gripping ka dekh raha tha.. aur tu bot k forward backward ka dekh raha tha. Aur us din k baad se hamare baaten hona start Hun. 


Aur yaad hai .. us din Diwali thi .. aur hum sab ne mil k sarvesh ki GPL lele thi.. Us bechare ka phone tut gaya tha hum sab k chakar mai. ğŸ˜‚ 


Tera wish thi ki Ek bar Tu, Mai aur Himanshu Ek saath daru peke bhand hote hain .. lekin Kabhi puri nahi ho paye .. because of corona .. aur wo Himanshu saala Kabhi phone bhe too Nahi utha tha. ğŸ¤¦

Us din meri 3 baje ki flight thi .. mai Mera samaan pack kr raha tha .. tu mere room pe aaya aur bola chal chalte hain Hall 12 Ek aakhri bar Himanshu se milne .. And that was our last real meet .. Baki reel meet too hote rehte hai apne. Lekin bus hum Dono ki hoti .. Himanshu rarely he aata hai.  

Hum teeno mileage jarur mileage .. aagar startup chal gaya tab too pakka melenge .. agar startup fail hua too koi nahi.. dusra startup start krne k leye melenge. ğŸ˜‚
author: Saroj  Anjesh

text: High nahi mar jayega bsdk .. menthol se
author: Saroj  Anjesh

text:
1st year ki winter in Iitk 
Bhai hum dono 2am tak computer center CC mai he rehte the.. jab tak SIS gaurd hame bhagane nahin ata tha. ğŸ˜‚ 

If you remember .. tu uss din raat ko mera room knock krne aaya tha. Jis din tera aur Harsh ka club mai jhagada hua tha .. tere aane se pehle he mujhe pata tha.. ki tum dono ki fight hue hai (Hitesh ne bata deya tha) .. meine intensionally mera room nahi khola tha. Taki wing mai aur backchodi na ho. (Aur us wakt Mujhe neend bhe aa rahi thi. ğŸ˜‚)

And honestly speaking .. Mujhe tujhe irritate krne mai bahut maza aati thi.. Jab bhe mai room mai bore hota tha.. tere room pe aa jata tha tujhe irritate krne k leye .. ğŸ˜‚ 

Tu bahut bada lodu hai saale ..ğŸ˜‚ Tu mere questions ko kabhi samajta he nahi tha. Tu jan bhuj k mere questions ka ulta he answers deta tha.. Just because this question was asked by Anjesh so it must stupid question.  ğŸ˜‘ But it's not like that. ğŸ˜

Lekin bhai jo bhe hai tune meri bahut help ki hai .. in terms of everything .. specially being my good friend .. spending time with me in my boredom, motivating me in my DC courses etc(end of things capacity) aur makkhan nahi laga sakta mai. ğŸ˜‚

"Aur han room khula rakh mai aabhi aa raha hun tere room pe garam pani lene .. mere ko shyaad corona hai .. too mere se dur he rehna aur mask pehne rehna."

And that's how we ended our last year of Iitk ..ğŸ¥² along with some truth and dare, selling cycles and coolers. And at the end OLA was on the gate a hug and hand shake. 
Bye Bahubali â¤ï¸
author: Saroj  Anjesh

text:
Aniket .. Aniket .. puma .. Aniket .. puma bolun ya Aniket bolun.. I don't know mai too Aniket he bolta tha. Pure 4 Saal..

**if you remember mostly these kind of conversation that we both use to have** 
 
You - Bhai tu mere dabba se dur reh .. 
Me -  bhai Aniket .. tu tension matt le .. mai tera dabba nahi kholunga .. mai too bus dekh raha hun .. 

Aniket sun meri baat .. Mai tujhe Ek startup idea bata hun .. Tu mujhe bata chalega k nahi .. 

Aniket mujhe ek baat bata.. hum black money kese chupa k rakh sakte hain .. aur government ko pata bhe na chale. ğŸ˜‚

Bhai tera room bulla HUB tha .. irrespective of the location of your room .. I remember .. us din meri flight thi .. mai jaldi jaldi mai tha .. aur tune HC jake mere RTPCR test ka reimbursement form bhara tha .. (jiska paisa abhi tak nahi aaya.) ğŸ˜‘ And that was our last meet and conversation in Iitk .. aab najane kab melenge .. lekin kismat hue too jatu melenge .. but we will try our best to stay connected in the coming future. ğŸ˜ƒ

Bye Aniket â¤ï¸
Take care of yourself.
author: Saroj  Anjesh

text:
Aur Anshuman Bhai.. ğŸ˜ 

Well, mujhe yaad hai .. Mai tujhse jab bhe kisi course k bare mai puchne aata tha.. 

Tu hamesa mujhe datta rehta tha aur .. mere fakkon k bare mai puchta tha ..  "Dekh Anjesh jhoot matt bol .. fakke hain too hain bata de." ğŸ˜‚ Aur mai saach bolun meine tujhse kabhi jhoot nahi bol tha. ğŸ¤·

Mai aalag he level pe rehta tha.. like .. meri exam ki preparation nahi hue hoti thi too mai dar k mare paper he dene nahi jata tha .. Aur tu Mujhe bolta tha.. "Saale ek bar paper too dene chala jata. Pass too ho he jata" 


Aur yaad hai .. Wo Horse Riding workshop .. ğŸ˜‚ un dino wing mai koi nahi the .. sab apne ghar chale gaye the .. wing mai sirf tu aur mai the .. aur hum dono horse riding workshop krwane chale jate the .. Tu official kam krta tha.. mai unofficially .. ğŸ˜‚

Pata nahi tu kahan se jugad kr k laya tha.  Jispe  mai apne bekar se photography skills try krta reha tha. Vese etne bhe bekar nahi thi ğŸ˜ .. etne he bekar hoti too .. Tu yearbook mai ye wali DP nahi lagata. Han agar tujhe yaad ho too teri ye DP meine he click ki thi us camera se. ğŸ˜‚ But those 7 days of workshop was really memorable. ğŸ¥ºğŸ¤§

Anyway .. I hope es wakt tu jis bhe cheej pe kam kr raha ho  .. usme tu safal ho Jaye. ğŸ˜ƒ And we will try our best to stay connected in coming future. ğŸ¤§

Bye Anshuman â¤ï¸
Take care of yourself
author: Saroj  Anjesh

text:
Ashutosh ğŸ™‹ğŸ˜

Well mujhe yaad hai .. we both started talking in galaxy 17 fine arts. Jiska secy Utkarsh Barsaiyan tha ğŸ˜‚.. jis ki meine Galti se khulwa ki thi. ğŸ˜.. es leye meri fatti thi finearts mai jane se.. lekin tum, Hitesh aur sarthak mujhe room se pakad k leke jate the .. Tumne mujhe fine arts mai.. merging sikhaya tha .. Jo mujhe kabhi thek se krne nahi aaya .. ğŸ˜‚ fir mujhe backdrop chipkane wala kam dedeya tha tum logon ne. ğŸ˜‚

Aur tujhe yaad hai .. 5th sem mai.. jab tu fine arts club ka codi tha.. meine tujhse spray canes mangi thi.. hamare humanodi bot pe colour krna tha.. usme se Ek spray wing mai aate he khatam ho gaya tha .. ğŸ˜‚ ... abhishek, panda, hitesh .. saalon ne mil k khatam kr de .. sabke door pe unke nickname likh likh ke. 

Bhai jab dekho Tu mujhe marta rehta tha .. ğŸ˜‘ apne taekwondo ki techniques mujhpe try krta tha. For no reason. ğŸ¤·ğŸ˜‘
Best of luck for your future bro. 

Bye Ashutosh â¤ï¸
Take care of yourself. ğŸ˜ƒ
author: Saroj  Anjesh

text:
Bhai aagar tujhe yaad ho .. teri 1st aur 2nd sem mai SPI backchod thi .. eska matlab samjh tu ... Tu backchod hai.. bus Tu padtha nahi hai.. 

Bhai wo Thermo (ESO201) wala course .. wo kese bhul sakte hain hum dono. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ¤¦bhai Bada chutiya course tha wo too.. sirf Ek course ne gand mar rakhi thi. ğŸ˜‚ aur Thermo mai .. Wo exam hall wala moment yaad hai tujhe?? .. hum dono ek dusre ko bus dekhe ja rahe the .. aur hum dono ko paper ka kuch nahi aata tha. ğŸ˜‚

Aur bhai PHY103 ka endsem .. mai saach bata raha hun .. meine wo endsem Ek he bar deya tha. Tumhare aur Sanjay k saath. ğŸ˜‚ If you remember. 

Bhai tu mujhe hamesa bolta rehta tha.. "tum aalag he level ho paper he nahi dene jate..pata nahi kis backchodi mai"  ye line mai nahi bhulunga. ğŸ˜‚

Bhai jhagade bhe hue hai hamare esa Nahi Hai... Hitesh k room mai Hua tha.. anshuman ki wajah se. ğŸ˜‚ Lekin.. jitne bar bhe jhagade hue hain.. Kuch dino baad hum Dono k beach sab normal ho jata tha..  jese ki kuch hua he na ho. ğŸ˜‚

Bye harsh â¤ï¸
Take care of yourself. ğŸ˜ƒ

We both will try our best to stay connected. ğŸ˜ƒ
author: Saroj  Anjesh

text:
Harsh bhai.. yaar thodi bandi wandi patawo kab tak padhte rahoge ..  bandi patawo.. jeewan ka aaslai sukh wahin melega. ğŸ˜‚

Khul k jeewan jeeya karo .. Zindagi mai kis baat dar hai.  Padhi wadhi too hoti rehti hai .. lekin jeewan jeene ka mauka Ek he bar milta hai .. too khul k jeewo. ğŸ˜ƒ Baki Jo hoyega wo dekha jayega. 

**Some memories**
Bhai China mai kettle tuta thi tujhse yaad hai ..  aur wo hotel wala chutiya saala 13k INR manga raha tha. Sirf ek lund jese kettle ka. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ¤¦

Aur najane kitne night-outs humne saath betayen .. humanoid room mai. ğŸ¥º

Mujhe aaj bhe yaad hai .. Tu morning mai AUTOMI assemble kr k class chala jata tha.. fir mai aur Himanshu class se aake uspe testing krte the. (Those days)ğŸ¤§ğŸ¥º


Aur FIRA mai yaad hai .. bot hum dono se he tuta tha ... Tu BOT fit kr raha tha. Aur meine pakad k rakha tha. Aur tabhi bot tut gaya. Tutne k baad fir hum dono ek dusre ko dekhne lage. ğŸ˜‚

Aur Han.. wo Korea to China wali trip .. jisme sirf hum dono the. ğŸ˜‚ Tujhe dar lag raha tha. Ki kahin Meri wajah se koi gadbad na ho jaye. 

Yaad hai tujhe .. wahan.. flight ko 3hrs bache the .. Aur mai tujhe bol raha tha. Chal china mall ghum k aate hain .. ğŸ˜‚

Yaar anyway those days were memorable and amazing. ğŸ¥ºğŸ¤§

Dekhte dekhte college k 4 Saal too khatam hogaye .. aab dekho zindagi kab milate hain tum dono ko. ğŸ¥º

Bye Harsh â¤ï¸
Take care of yourself.
author: Saroj  Anjesh

text:
Aare Mohit bhai. ğŸ˜ğŸ™‹

Teri ek aachi baat .. Tu Kisi bhe cheej pe  feedbacks genuine deta hai .. jo tere dil mai.. wo juban pe.. 

Aur bhai teri lifestyle .. the way you live the life ... inspires me all the time. (Gym, protein shake, protein powder, eggs .. bhai bhai etna sab kese kr lete ho) .. Tujhse inspire hoke meine bhe tere saath gym join kr leya tha .. lekin tune corona positive hoke gym he band krwa deya. ğŸ˜‚

Aur bhai teri cycle yaar. Wo badi backchod thi.. chalne mai maza aa jati thi.. Usko sambhal k rakhna. ğŸ˜‚

Well It's not the end of our life .. but who knows .. ki aab najaane kab melenge hum. Ye zindagi hai.. kuch ese he chalti hai. Har suruat ka annt hota hai .. fir chaheye wo corona he kyu na ho. 


Bye Mohit â¤ï¸ 
Take care of yourself
author: Saroj  Anjesh

text:
Rohan bhaii.. ğŸ˜

Mai tera roomi mujhe matt bhulna yaar ğŸ™‹ğŸ˜‚ .. tujhe pata hai .. mai jab bhe semester breaks mai campus se ghar pe jata tha .. mere parents tere bare mai hamesa puchte thi. Because puri Iitk mai wo sirf tujhe he jante hai. XD

Bhai tera alarm ğŸ˜‚ 
Tujhe pata hai .. 1st year mai bahut bar tera alarm mai band kr k sota tha.  Mujhe aaj bhe yaad hai wo song. "Who let the dog out" ğŸ˜‚


Aur bhai NCC, PE .. ğŸ˜‚ Yaar bahut aachi memories hai hum dono ki NCC aur PE  ki.  Agar tu jaldi uth jata tha too mujhe utha deta tha. ğŸ¥ºğŸ¤§

NCC mai Independent day wala fraud wo nahi bhulunga mai .. tune mujhe call kr k bol deya tha. "Anjesh NCC ground mai attendence lag rahi hai aaja" ğŸ¥ºğŸ¤§ 


PHY103 ki .. endsem ki raat .. wo raat ğŸ˜‚ğŸ¤¦ ..  jis din mai Health Center gaya tha just because meine kuch padha nahi tha. ğŸ˜‚ .. Us raat hum dono ne bahut discuss deya tha. Ki mujhe HC jana chaheye ya nahi. ğŸ˜‚ 


Mujhe aaj bhe yaad hai .. Tu mujhe hardam bolta tha rehta tha .. "Anjesh padh le nahi too fail ho jayega"  I won't forget that line ğŸ¤§

Yaar pass fail too hota rehta hai.. but memorable and happy life jeena wo important hai .. and that's what I lived .. In being your room mate and a good friend. ğŸ¤§

Bhai wo last k do months tujhe campus aana chaheye tha. We all wingis really missed you alot. ğŸ¥º

Aur jesa ki hardam hota hai .. No-one can  defeat time. Samay kab nikal jayega pata bhe nahi chalega. 

Anyway enough of BT .. mai aasha krta hun tu jahan be ho hardam khus rahe. And stay connected. ğŸ¥º

Bye Rohan â¤ï¸
Take care of yourself.
author: Saroj  Anjesh

text:
Yo Sarthak . ğŸ˜.. vese Ek baat bataun tera roll number 170635 tha .. aur mera 634 tha .. yes consecutive numbers .. aur hamre mulakat eshe se hue thi .. un dino orientation k din chal rahe the .. tu mera wingi tha .. mujhe pata bhe nahi tha .. Auditorium mai hum dono baju baju mai baithe the .. Aur mujhe yaad hai .. orientation k 3rd day pe meine tere baat krne start keya tha .. and the conversation was like. 

Me - aur bhai. Kaun se hall se ho??
You - hall 5 
You - tum??
Me - same hall 5 
Me - hall 5 mai kaun sa block?? 
You - C block 
Me - Mai bhe C block se he hun. 
You - ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…
Me - Bhai wing kaun se hai tumhare? 
You - C-Mid 
Me - Aare bhai .. Mera bhe wahi hai ğŸ˜‚


Aur ese he hamare mulakat, aur Iitk ki char saalon ki journey suru hue thi.. aur aaj dekho.. dekhte dekhte wo char saal kab nikal gaye pata bhe nahi chala. 

Well, It's a basic rule of life .. Jo shuru hota hai .. usse kahatam hone he hai.. fir chahe wo corona he kyun na ho. ğŸ˜‚

Anyway .. I hope zindagi mai jahan bhe ho tu .. hamesa khus rahe .. and we will try our best to stay connected. 

Bye Sarthak â¤ï¸
Take care of yourself
author: Saroj  Anjesh
